settings.title: FESTIVE WINE MOCKTAILS
settings.text: Got a kit? See below for recipes, tips, tricks and more!

Fill the ice cube tray with non-alc. wine or fruit juice of your choice (see below for recommendations), then freeze.

Fill the baubles with the wine and chill until ready to serve.

Fill the wine glass with the ice balls, pop in a garnish and place the liquid bauble on top of the glass.

Then enjoy pouring theÂ drink into the glass when you're ready to sip!

settings.title: Lychee and Finger Lime Mocktails
settings.text:
Muddle 3-4 Lychees in each glass before adding ice. Use ALTINA Finger Lime Sauvignon Blanc in the baubles.

Alternatively, freeze lychee juice in the ice moulds, top with Finger Lime Sauvignon Blanc and garnish with a fresh lychee.

settings.title: CHERRY ROSE MOCKTAILS
settings.text: Muddle 5-6 Cherries in each glass before adding ice. Use ALTINA Kakadu Plum in the baubles. Garnish with fresh cherries and a dried orange.

settings.title: Festive Sangria
settings.text:
Freeze orange juice in the ice moulds. Add to the glass together with dried oranges and cherries/cranberries.

Fill the baubles with ALTINA Sansgria.

settings.title: I HAVE A SWEET TOOTH
settings.text:
ALTINA's NA wines are are dry
(there's no added sugars). If you like a sweeter mocktail, we recommend muddling with a sweeter fruit (eg. lychee).

Alternatively, make a simple syrup (dissolve 1 part sugar in 1 part water) and add this to the glass before the ice.

settings.title: How much ice should i use?
settings.text:
For a standard wine glass, to get the look above , we recommend at least one full ice ball tray per glass. You can freeze the ice balls ahead of time and store them in a container in the freezer.

Using wine or fruit juice in your ice mould stops the drink from getting too watery as the ice melts.

settings.title: How do i use the ball ice mould?
settings.text:
Fill the bottom of the tray with liquid (approx 2/3 full). Put the lid (the one with the holes) on and squeeze. The lid should stay in place, however feel free to place a rubber band around the middle of the tray.

To release the balls, gently bend the tray to loosen the ice balls. Lift the lid, invert and gently tap into a bowl/container.

settings.title: Presentation is everything!
settings.text:
Make this festive mocktail experience as interactive as you like.

Put out a selection of fruit, garnishes, wine and ice balls.

Guests can fill their own baubles and glasses, then garnish and pour!
